# Storage

- Fresh cheese needs to be kept refrigerated. Once opened use within 7 days.
- Dairy is not freezable.

# Bacon Storage

- Fresh meat needs to be kept refrigerated. Once opened use within 2-3 days.
- Meat is freezable. Once frozen use within 1-2 months.
- When spoiled: smells acidic, grey coloured.
